meanings.definition: A small metal disk used in coin production.
meanings.sent1: The factory worker carefully inspected the planchets before starting the coin-making process.
meanings.sent2: The minting machine stamped the design onto the planchets to create shiny coins.
meanings.sent3: When the planchets rolled off the conveyor belt, they formed a neat line on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The planchets gleamed like tiny mirrors under the bright lights of the minting facility.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the planchets being struck echoed through the coin factory.

meanings.definition: The blank metal piece on which a coin is struck.
meanings.sent1: After the design was approved, the minting process began on the planchets.
meanings.sent2: The engraver carefully etched the intricate details onto the planchets.
meanings.sent3: The planchets lined up obediently, waiting their turn to become valuable coins.
meanings.sent4: Each planchet carried the potential to transform into a piece of currency.
meanings.sent5: The planchets shone like silver moons in the dimly lit minting room.
